description: This Dashboard provides a general overview of a Linux system, with templating to host and Interval

targets.query: SELECT mean(/top_ads/) FROM "exec_pihole_more" WHERE ("host" = 'nitida2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean(/top_queries/) FROM "exec_pihole_more" WHERE ("host" = 'nitida2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("total") - mean("free") FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

title: Pi Hole
